title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 5, pt. 542 - Subrogated Claims To Liable Third Parties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 5, pt. 542 - Subrogated Claims To Liable Third Parties

State Regulations
§ 542.1 - Claims to which social services officials are subrogated
§ 542.2 - Designation of providers as agents to file subrogated claims
§ 542.3 - Assignment of subrogated claims proceeds to providers
§ 542.4 - Notice of subrogation to liable third parties

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 5, pt. 542

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20[3] [d], 34[3] [f], 363-a[2], 366[3], 366[4][h], 367-a[2]
[b]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
